section.heading: Portion of the state highway system to be designated as the "88th Infantry Division, the Blue Devils Memorial Highway"

content.p:
ยง 342-ff. Portion of the state highway system to be designated as the
"88th Infantry Division, the Blue Devils Memorial Highway". 1. That
portion of the state highway system located in the county of Steuben and
known as state route 17, excluding that portion of state route 17 from
the village of Painted Post to the town of Campbell designated as the
Marine Corps League Memorial Highway pursuant to section three hundred
forty-two-v of this article, shall be designated and known as the "88th
Infantry Division, the Blue Devils Memorial Highway".
 2. The commissioner shall provide for the installation and maintenance
of adequate signing of the state highway system as designated pursuant
to subdivision one of this section.
